titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of September 13, 2022, as "Intermodal Day".
Expressing support for the designation of September 13, 2022, as "Intermodal Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Intermodal Day to celebrate the intermodal industry's vital contribution to the movement of freight and to a vibrant U.S. economy.
